meanings.definition: Failing to show proper respect or courtesy towards women.
meanings.sent1: He was being very ungallant when he didn't hold the door open for the lady.
meanings.sent2: It is considered ungallant to speak rudely to a woman.
meanings.sent3: The knight's ungallant behavior towards the princess was quite shocking.
meanings.sent4: His ungallant remarks cut through the room like a sharp blade.
meanings.sent5: The image of him being ungallant is forever etched in her memory.

meanings.definition: Not chivalrous or courteous towards others, especially women.
meanings.sent1: She found his ungallant behavior towards her friends very off-putting.
meanings.sent2: It is never acceptable to be ungallant towards anyone, regardless of gender.
meanings.sent3: His ungallant attitude at the party made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent4: The stormy weather matched his ungallant mood perfectly.
meanings.sent5: The memory of his ungallant actions lingered in the air long after he left.
